channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: What Should We Expect Our Laws to Do? [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Every year thousands of pieces of proposed legislation are filed by state legislators across the country, and hundreds become enacted law. Ever thought about what we expect those laws to do based on what the Bible says law does and how God uses law? David offers valuable insight on why the “good” laws we get enacted seem to do so little good.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: How Would William Blackstone Evaluate Todayâ€™s Christian Legal Advocates [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: David uses a quote from William Blackstone’s famous Commentaries about common law that explains the two foundations for human law and how they were applied to various kinds of social issues. He uses it to test the legal arguments being made in court by leading pro-family advocates in defense of laws involving children and medical procedures affecting their reproductive systems. The contrast may shock you.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
